channel.title: Server suddenly stopped working online help please FIXED!
channel.description:
I had like 20+ people on a day on my server for about a week then suddenly no one can connect to it...
[b]My ip hasn't changed My no-ip is running Settings in my router are the same[/b]
I can't find the problem

item.title: Server suddenly stopped working online help please FIXED!
item.dc:creator: @Alphaspida Alphaspida
item.description:
@Alphaspida wrote:

nevermind, i got it to work. my forwarded ip was changed, so i had to change it again. i guess my ip did change -.-

Read full topic
item.source: Server suddenly stopped working online help please FIXED!

item.title: Server suddenly stopped working online help please FIXED!
item.dc:creator: @boomer4456 boomer4456
item.description:
@boomer4456 wrote:

[quote=“Bryanc, post:7, topic:229440”]Right click in the DUC and refresh the host list.

Then un-check and re-check the box. If it still isn’t working, then check your emails. No-ip sometimes cancels the no-ip after a certain amount of time. So you may need to re-add it to your account.[/quote] should have thought of that lolz that happen to me once

Read full topic
item.source: Server suddenly stopped working online help please FIXED!

item.title: Server suddenly stopped working online help please FIXED!
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

Right click in the DUC and refresh the host list.

Then un-check and re-check the box. If it still isn’t working, then check your emails. No-ip sometimes cancels the no-ip after a certain amount of time. So you may need to re-add it to your account.

Read full topic
item.source: Server suddenly stopped working online help please FIXED!

item.title: Server suddenly stopped working online help please FIXED!
item.dc:creator: @Alphaspida Alphaspida
item.description:
@Alphaspida wrote:

It has always been checked, although when I went to look at my no-ip client after I noticed the server was offline, the box was unchecked.

Now it has been checked for a day now and still hasn’t worked

Read full topic
